caption:
Raise a Glass to Style: Lush Wine & Spirits Enters the Fashion Game

Lush Wine & Spirits isn’t just about fine wines, craft cocktails, and a good time anymore—we’re now making waves in fashion! Introducing our 1st Edition T-Shirt, a bold way to take the Lush experience beyond the bottle.

This isn’t just merch; it’s a lifestyle. A statement. A way to share your refined-yet-relaxed outlook on life with the world. Slip into this exclusive tee for just $25 and show off your impeccable taste—not just in spirits, but in style.

Why you need this shirt:

Iconic status: This is the first edition, making you part of Lush history.
Conversation starter: Whether at brunch, happy hour, or strolling your favorite wine shop, this tee says, “I know good taste.”
The trend is real: “All the kids are doing it,” and by kids, we mean discerning Lush lovers like you.

Elevate your wardrobe with a shirt that’s as vibrant, fun, and timeless as your favorite glass of red—or white, or bubbly. For only $25, you can rep your favorite spot in town and look effortlessly chic doing it.

The Lush Wine & Spirits vibe, now available to wear. Snag yours before this vintage is gone!

Moist January: Everything in Moderation, Even Moderation.
